entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued December 08 at 7:54PM PST by NWS
entry.summary: An area of light, to possibly moderate snow will move across the region through 930 PM. Only light accumulation, if any, is expected, but with road surfaces already cold and temperatures below freezing, roads could become slick quickly. If you are driving across the region tonight, slow down, and allow for extra space between your vehicle and those around you.
